sentences.en: And even Mary could assure her family that she had no disinclination for it.
sentences.cn: 甚至连曼丽也告诉家里人说,她对于这次舞会也不是不感到兴趣.

sentences.en: For example: Dig coal, dig iron ore, although very make money, but my disinclination.
sentences.cn: 例如: 挖煤 、 挖铁矿, 虽然很赚钱, 但我不感兴趣.

sentences.en: He has a disinclination for work.
Here, I would argue, simple ineptitude seems to be a bigger problem than disinclination to co - operate.
sentences.cn: 依我见,在这个问题上,相比不愿合作的态度, 纯粹的无能似乎是更严重的问题.

sentences.en: His disinclination for modesty is well known.
sentences.cn: 他对谦虚的厌恶是众所周知的.

sentences.en: How can I conquer my disinclination to meet people?

sentences.en: I'm afraid I have quite a disinclination to retire on a pension.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我很不愿意领养老金退休.

sentences.en: the increasing disinclination of farm workers’ children to consider a job in farming
sentences.cn: 农场工人的子女越来越不愿意务农的趋势

sentences.en: There was a general disinclination to return to the office after lunch.
sentences.cn: 午饭后人们一般都懒得回办公室办公。

sentences.en: They are showing a marked disinclination to pursue these opportunities.
sentences.cn: 他们对争取这些机会明显表现出不乐意。

sentences.en: To such a minute of accrual, my disinclination disinclination!
